mapper.select: select tc.company_name,tc.version,tc.create_time, tc.user_id regist_user_id, tu.user_name regist_user_name,tu.phone regist_user_phone , tc.company_type,tc.user_scale, tc.business_license_url, tc.authenticator_id, tc.account_count, tc.staff_count, tc.regist_address,tc.auth_status from t_company_info tc left join t_user_info tu on tu.user_id = tc.user_id where tc.company_id =#{companyId}
select u.user_id,u.user_name from user u left join user_company uc on u.user_id =uc.user_id where uc.company_id =#{companyId}
